Opinion: Trump's strange way of thinking "There is nothing either good or bad," Hamlet tells his old childhood buddies in Shakespeare's play, "but thinking makes it so." President Donald Trump borrowed that principle this week as he strove in vain to turn bad news about the coronavirus into some kin…

It's not enough to delete Trump's 'white power' video tweet Dean Obeidallah writes that Trump's now-deleted tweet sharing footage of supporters yelling "white power" was was not a mistake but a repeat of his 2016 campaign playbook, which trafficked in bigotry to divide Americans.
